int: DASUTT 2024 LIVE IN TAIPEI "You may have never heard Dasutt but you will never listen to it once." With the flexible guitar lines, it is even more fans on live performances.In 2018, the first protagonist who performed as the "Quiet Communications" planned with us opened the connection signal of the Taiwanese audience and the Kindie scene.Knowing Dasutt does not require any threshold, they turn the sorrows into light swinging sounds, and the resonance of youth with the words can be used to taste the lyrics quietly. As long as the fast song humming "51155", you can easily sing you. The Mercedes -Benz guitar RIFF in Lunch Time, Ya, YA is in love or was shaken by the emotional works of youth, like a sea.Lunch Time, the most well -known masterpiece of DASUTT in the early days, sang the 20th generation and 30th generation who was inspired by the lunch break of the work.When the orchestra is about to take off, Dasutt announced that all members will join the army and suspend the event.In 2023, DASUTT returned after three years of empty window period and announced the signing of the Culturethink to restart the event.During the period, their second EP title song Youth was recommended by KPOP stars such as NCT Tai Rong, TXT Xiubin, etc., and let them stand on the TV show of Cui Zhengxun's night park for the first time and sing the original soundtrack of Korean drama villain Lonly Night. tit: Dream
int: We are Taipei Dunhua Middle School Strings Orchestra, which advanced to the National Music Competition for 17 consecutive years.At the age of 13, we adhere to the persistence and efforts of music in the National Concert Hall in 2021. The violin chief Chen Enyu and the chief of the cello Chen Xuanying and the Orchestra Essay Venifski No. 2 Violin Concerto and Defuzak B small cello concerto, as well as music creators Ji Zhongping, Middle School String Orchestra was established in 2006 and is Dunhua The school team of key development in the middle school.The Dunzhong String Orchestra hires the well -known conductor Xu Jiaming to guide Xu Jiaming to direct and guide the school's school in Shuangbei City Tao Limanmen to achieve excellent results in the Taipei Music Competition and the National Competition every year.Dunzhong Xianle actively participated in various competitions and performances with the support and efforts of the principal and parents' support association over the years.Every year, domestic and foreign performances have performed at the National Concert Hall and Weiwuying Concert Hall and have been invited to perform in the Presidential Palace in my country.From 2023 to Vienna to participate in the SCL Youth International Music Competition to win the excellent gold award, the outstanding music talent of the students.Dunzhong Xianle continues to cultivate students' music literacy through music education and cultivate the beauty of string music to Taiwan and around the world to bring rich music feasts to countless people.Commander, Xu Jiaming, was six -year -old. Fang Xingqi Qi Meng Cello Zengfu, Teacher Liao Meiying, Teacher Liao Meiying, Teacher Lin Xiu, and Xiong Shilan.In 1984 and 1985, he won the first place in the Taipei Music Competition Youth Group and the 1987 Taiwan Music Competition Youth Cello and indoor music champion.During the middle school, he went to Bavaria, Germany to participate in the music summer in the summer of two consecutive years. He was taught in the world's top string quadrilateral Alban Berg Quartet to become the earliest group in China to receive indoor music courses in Europe.In August 1986, the first achievement was held in Hong Kong and performed in the province in 1987.Currently taught in Linkou Junior High School, New Taipei City, New Taipei City Netxi Elementary School Orchestra, Taipei Guangfu Elementary School tit: "Return to The Revisit" Cicada 15th Anniversary Concert
int: Return to the memory border and re -interpret human and nature with voices.CICADA span the time difference will make past works such as tide -to -tiders; fifteen years long travel to feel each former white and rest.In the past, we never disappeared our love and stare, such as a song and a forest, such as wetlands and dolphins, they are still waiting for being played again, being remembered by you and me.Cicada believes: "Each song will evolve them to grow with us." In the past, the new interpretation of the new interpretation of the emotional sedimentation of the emotional sea tide was brought back to the wind and rain in the past. Review records more accurately chase the notes with emotional anchor emotions with emotions.When we used the current retrospective, we still loved and moved in the past.Performance track 1 Waves and strokes the Gravel Beach. Falling in the golden yellow grass slope 9 Looking up at the sea level performance song, night scene 1 was originally a place that was originally home. The city that jumped out of the water 7 after the coastal mountains 8 turned off the lights. tit: Fruit of Yuan Town -Chiayi Field
int: Did you eat fruit today?Come and feel the really sweet feeling!It turns out that it is called "Fruit of Yuan Tun" so that you can't miss it as a foodie for agricultural products!Freshly listed quality guarantees the original place of origin of the original place of origin from the roots of the tongue roots. In the resonance of the sale and music, the farmer dances to find the most fateful fruit of the fruit.Sweet and bitterness is the unique charm of life. Following the fruits in the most mixed melody and the handsomeness of the countryside. banana".The creation base sets out a sincere and smooth rock song for his hometown of Kaohsiung Qishan from the rural emotions to his hometown.Taiqing Banana is the original intention of the orchestra that combines rural industries and music in Taiwan to convey the care of land, the observation of the industrial rise and decline in the song and live performance of the banana industry of the Qishan of the hometown, and the enthusiastic combination of practical musicians and musicians and musicians and musicians and the practice of practical enthusiasm. The role of farmers has developed a very characteristic orchestra to attract more people to pay attention to the voices of local youths.After the 2008 Ballad Corps, the series of local industrial cultural operations have been profound in the field survey, local small travel, local industrial promotion, and community construction.The four -year background blue banana band has become the energy of farmers to play the influence of the influence of the influence of the influence of music and actual actions. Therefore, the energy of surviving and brightening the old signboards began to gather social actions.In 2009, the first EP "Banana He is not fat" said that the problem of the banana industry in Taiwan has also successfully attracted the society to start paying attention to the banana industry.In 2013, the first music album "Community Large and Small" was transformed from the public affairs of the community to music to music. tit: Fruit of Yuantou -Taichung Field
int: Did you eat fruit today?Come and feel the really sweet feeling!It turns out that it is called "Fruit of Yuan Tun" so that you can't miss it as a foodie for agricultural products!Freshly listed quality guarantees the original place of origin of the original place of origin from the roots of the tongue roots. In the resonance of the sale and music, the farmer dances to find the most fateful fruit of the fruit.Sweet and bitterness is the unique charm of life. Following the fruits in the most mixed melody and the handsomeness of the countryside. banana".The creation base sets out a sincere and smooth rock song for his hometown of Kaohsiung Qishan from the rural emotions to his hometown.Taiqing Banana is the original intention of the orchestra that combines rural industries and music in Taiwan to convey the care of land, the observation of the industrial rise and decline in the song and live performance of the banana industry of the Qishan of the hometown, and the enthusiastic combination of practical musicians and musicians and musicians and musicians and the practice of practical enthusiasm. The role of farmers has developed a very characteristic orchestra to attract more people to pay attention to the voices of local youths.After the 2008 Ballad Corps, the series of local industrial cultural operations have been profound in the field survey, local small travel, local industrial promotion, and community construction.The four -year background blue banana band has become the energy of farmers to play the influence of the influence of the influence of the influence of music and actual actions. Therefore, the energy of surviving and brightening the old signboards began to gather social actions.In 2009, the first EP "Banana He is not fat" said that the problem of the banana industry in Taiwan has also successfully attracted the society to start paying attention to the banana industry.In 2013, the first music album "Community Large and Small" was transformed from the public affairs of the community to music to music. tit: The 40th anniversary of the article "No longer drifting 365 miles"
int: The 40th anniversary of the article "No longer drifting 365 miles" was officially launched in 2024, which has been officially launched in 40 years. After his family arrived in Indonesia, he studied in the United States and Canada after studying in Japan. tit: Mono 25th Anniversary Orchestral Tour Oath Asia Tour 2024
int: Mono has continuously challenged the various possibilities of exploratory instrumental rock in the past few decades. This has also made them one of the most important Asian bands to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the band and will start their first 12 -person orchestra. As the Asian tour, with the success of their new album Oath, it is expected that this performance will be a particularly and beautiful performance.About Oath, what do we have done in 2020 what will be the existentialism of the former classic night idlers almost become the topic of everyone's daily discussion. What can we do in a limited life? Mono discusses some themes that are the relationship between light and darkness, the hope of facing disaster, the duality of life and death. In the 12th album, they think about the time for life and how to make full use of that period of time.An old friend and partner of Steve Albini recorded and mixed together to let OATH open with the slow rise of orchestra to make the orchestra into the atmosphere before joining the violin.In the 71 minutes of the entire album, Mono thought about time and life to add a beautiful atmosphere to a beautiful atmosphere to push Oath to a new height in a new height.Mono challenged himself with a publicism related existentialism and provided kind reflection with the album of OATH instead of fleeting.â€œæˆ‘ä»¬ç”Ÿæ´»åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªä»å°å°±æ²¡æœ‰æ”¹å˜çš„èª“è¨€å½“ä¸­å¬é£åœ¨å”±æ­Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ˜¯å®‡å®™çš„ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†æˆ‘ä»¬å·²ç»çŸ¥é“æˆ‘ä»¬è¯¥æ€ä¹ˆåšä»¥åŠä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯ç”Ÿå‘½ä¸­æœ€é‡è¦çš„Takaakira 'Goto',MONOMONO 25th Anniversary Orchestral TourOATH Asia Tour 2024Featuring 12Piece Orchestralive in Taipeidate20241106venuezepp New TaipeIMEDOOR 1900 Start 2000TicketAdv 200022002400 will use a full seat method (except 2F station areas) to enter the section of the 2F station area in line.

tit: The 40th anniversary of the article "No longer drifting 365 miles"
int: The 40th anniversary of the article "No longer drifting 365 miles" was officially launched in 2024, which has been officially launched in 40 years. After his family arrived in Indonesia, he studied in the United States and Canada after studying in Japan. In 1983, he was introduced to the Emi Taiwan (Emi Taiwan) in October 1984, "Back to Singapore to visit relatives in Singapore. road".Because the growth process of the article traveled to many countries has created his unique style, and the content of the lyrics is full of wandering and foreign travelers who missed the old land. Travel in Taiwan, China, Singapore and Malaysia.A high -pitched voice of 365 miles not only sang a wandering tour, but also the endless suffering in his heart, so he was widely welcomed in the Asian region.In 1985, he won the Best Newcomer Award of the Golden Volual Award and the "Golden Ding Award" Best Singer Award. tit: Sustainable love, Feng Weijie Feng Weijie Public Welfare Tour Concert Taichung Field
int: The eighth graduation of Ajie Hua Shi Shi Shi Shi Singing Class has worked as a chief shop from the grassroots level to know the hard work and needs before his debut.Since 2002, the two -person group entered the entertainment industry and sang many popular songs, such as the "General Shop Master" with Sanli TV series and "Blessings" of Police Broadcasting, and YouTube million golden songs "in me There will always be you in your heart "," Today "," Love You "," My Anda "," The Song of the Lovers Singing and Singing Love ", the warm and beautiful sound of the two -strait fans on both sides of the strait favorite.In addition to singing, he also across the border as a radio show host to share good songs and audiences to establish deep friendship and life stories with many audiences through broadcasting.It appears in its singing to make its singing more warm and positive.In the early 2016 concert, the appearance of large -scale public welfare tours every two years was well received for the disadvantages of cerebral palsy and singing surplus.Including 2022 "Hope and Love Von", 2023 "Xiang Feng. Red Man Show".And this time, the surplus was donated to the body and mental disorders to light a beacon for the weak.He always felt that it was a kind of happiness and singing for public welfare.The theme is: Sustainable Love Forever Forever Feng Weijie Public Welfare Tour every concert will bring you the best.In order to let everyone see different Feng Weijie in 2024, Feng Weijie started planning to warm up two years ago and specially arranged every familiar country, Minnan songs and wonderful program arrangements. EssenceIn the past three years, the world has been affected by the epidemic and the world war. Many people have lost their lives and hope that they will gradually alienate trust and feelings between interpersonal. Feng Weijie's public welfare image.Therefore, this concert will show the true romantic note of people, things, and things as the theme of "Farewell Forever Forever" as the theme.In addition to inviting the well -known singer "Zhang Xiuqing" and several mysterious guests loved by several people, in addition to the good songs of the table for the table, many well -known singers sing and sing classic songs.Use song stories, stories to bring songs with touching backgrounds and rich and wonderful, millions of wonderful stage effects, a new plan for each new plan will fully perform the connotation of each cooked song and life in the song.There is a complete life and love story like a complete life and love that makes everyone see and feel different Feng Weijie and light up the warm light together.On December 7, 2024 (Sat) 19:30, Taichung Zhongxing University Huiyi Hall 1000, 20000, 3000, 4000, 5000, 6000 physical and mental disorders and their necessary accompanied by a 50 % off ticket was accepted to the 1126th. Time refers to the hosted and sold for retreat in accordance with the relevant provisions of the Times website plan. 0425340739
